title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, there is an unexpected behavior.
EB: When I do this, I hear a 'Windows ding' sound (the bell sound that means you did something wrong).
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ControlExampleText.
2. Choose SWT.MULTI from the options.
3. Observe the beep sound.
